# ApiKeyAuthenticationOptions.StaticApiKeyAsBytes property

Gets the expected API key as a UTF-8 byte array, or null if [`StaticApiKey`](./StaticApiKey) is not set.

```csharp
public byte[]? StaticApiKeyAsBytes { get; }
```
